reviewText: Treme is a wonderful series but the warning that this DVD set will not play on US DVD players was not part of the information available when I bought it.  If in US do not buy this unplayable set.
Well first I had to return it because it did not work on my DVD player. Saying something about it is not from this region. So I will not be purchasing no more dvd through you guys
The DVDs won't play in my Displayed.  It says no disk inserted.  I tried three different DVD players.
Treme was one of the best ever dramas on HBO.  I wish it could be resurrected as a new show . . .  10+ years post-Katrina, there are still stories to be told from the perspective of NOLA's residents.
